name: Fidget Games - Glide, Flip & Spinz fidget cube
name_original: Fidget Games - Glide, Flip & Spinz fidget cube
description:
Fidget Games help you stay focused.

Inspired by Fidget Cube. Fidget Games is a collection of Spin, Dial, Click, Glide, Flick, Roll and breathe Games.

Still bored ?
'Spinner VS Cube' challenge is also a part fidget games!
